slim_seo.title: Rewind Y2K - The Drake
slim_seo.description: The Rewind Party is back!! Welcome to our 3rd annual Halloween Party – Scary Movie ! 90’s and early 2000s related costumes HIGHLY ENCOURAGED for the full experience. All costumes are welcome. Please NO costume masks. 90’s and early 2000s dress code in effect for the full experience. $50 cash prize for best dressed. Exciting giveaways and special surprises happening throughout the night. Playing the best R&B, HipHop and Dancehall from theearly 2000sto todays music all night long. Tell a friend to tell a friend! Music by: D J Shannyn Hill X.A.V The DJ Hosted by: Melo Griffith Featuring performances by Realije – The Beatbox EMCEE Melo Griffith
